citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:45PM on 6 Jan
21.
Arrived at facility, adult at the address said that licensee was no longer at the address. Tried calling, no voicemail, sent a
text message.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:45PM on 6 Jan 
21. 
 
Arrived at facility, adult at the address said that licensee was no longer at the address.  Tried calling, no voicemail, sent a 
text message. 
 
 
 
End Section
